repairedDockerfile:
FROM microsoft/dotnet:latest 

MAINTAINER Dan Gershony - CoinVault <dan@coinvault.io> 

# install git and nano 
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y nano git \
&& echo -e "\nexport TERM=xterm" >> ~/.bashrc && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN mkdir -p /nako 

# clone the repository and build 
RUN git clone https://github.com/CoinVault/Nako.git /nako 

# remove git and the sourc 
RUN apt-get purge -y --auto-remove git 

WORKDIR /nako/core 
RUN dotnet restore 
RUN dotnet build 

EXPOSE 9000 
ENTRYPOINT ["dotnet", "run"]
